translation:
Friend Senhor Quincoze

The man who sent me the jaguars tells me that for them they offer him 15 silver patacões and one in copper; therefore, may Your Grace Senhor Forte Gatto have 12$800 in silver and five more in copper.

Your obliged friend, Domingos José de Almeida. Piratini, July 18, 1838.

Senhor Quincoze — In hand.
